alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 2:06AM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts. Lesser amounts below 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River, Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; San Juan River Basin
